<title level="1" right="Rules">[Piloting Actions](/Rules.aspx?ID=1291)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 175</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Characters use the actions listed below to move and interact with vehicles. The effects of the reckless trait appear on page 176.
